title: Ep. 62 - NCIS Indianapolis
description:
On today's show, the guys let loose on a plethora of topics including but not limited to; the time Todd almost solved a cold case murder from Hawaii, Kim Kardashian's law degree, old people driving, PETA, National Pet Day, mansions in Virginia, The Pub's current mouse infestation problem, Todd's dog, Fat Jimmy, killing a rabbit, what they all think of the new Lion King trailer and whether or not Pat should see the original before the new one comes out, and some run-in's they've had with home security. Per usual, the guys each send in a song to help propel you into the weekend with another edition of Friday Bangerz. It's a fun one, come and have a good time with us.


This episode features @toddmccomas, @PatMcAfeeShow, @Digz, @nickmaraldo, @tyschmit, @BostonConnr, @HeyGorman, @VivalaZito, and @evanfoxy.
dc:creator: The Pod
